Method index

base_name(mixed)
This method returns the name of the file of an object without an extensions.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
base_name
string base_name(mixed val)
This method returns the name of the file of an object without an extensions.

Parameters:
val - the ob or string name
Returns:
the base name of the object
